answers.answer: Congratulations to you!!! I had a U/S today (I'm 36.3) and my baby is 7.14lbs. the doctor thinks the baby is too big and sent me for a glucose tolerance test tomorrow. Did they tell you anything about the possibility of being diabetic??
Good luck!!!!! Praying for a healthy baby and mommy!!!
I guess... Ha Ha.. So this baby being big does not have anything to do with diabetes.. that's good news! Congratulations and God bless you.

yeah I have gestational diabetes with previous pregnancies so they keep a close check on that with me, this time I was fine, none what so ever....I didn't have it with the last one either and he was 8lbs 8ozs induced 2 weeks early as well.....I guess I just like having big babies...LOL!
Wishing you a quick and easy delivery!

question: Well ladies, I am finally going to be induced tomorrow night at 11 pm (38w3d).  I hope to be holding a beautiful, healthy baby girl by Friday am.  I am nervous and happy at the same time.  I had an u/s today to see how she was doing and see what her estimated weight was 9lbs5ozs of course you know this is only an estimate and can go 1 lb either way.  She was looking good, just big and long and they say she has a good amount of hair, so we will see!  Got a quick question if anyone can help:  I was going to name her Chloe, but saw quiet a few others had that name picked as well.  I've been tossing around a few other names b/c I like different stuff, but I need help with a middle name:If you have any ideas let me know:LaneyShaniaAbbeygalePlease keep us in your thoughts and prayers and I will update you as soon as I can.  Take care and good luck to all!!
title: Induction tomorrow
